data.name: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Champions Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
Ms. Marvel! Nova! Miles Morales! This generation’s greatest Super Heroes unite with other young heroes from around the world to form The Champions! Download now to play as:
Ironheart
Devil Dinosaur
Moon Girl
Viv Vision & Sparky
Amadeus Cho
Nadia Pym Wasp
Kate Bishop
Nova
data.about_the_game:
Ms. Marvel! Nova! Miles Morales! This generation’s greatest Super Heroes unite with other young heroes from around the world to form The Champions! Download now to play as:

data.short_description: Ms. Marvel! Nova! Miles Morales! This generation’s greatest Super Heroes unite with other young heroes from around the world to form The Champions! Download now to play as: Ironheart Devil Dinosaur Moon Girl Viv Vision & Sparky Amadeus Cho Nadia Pym Wasp Kate Bishop...
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Мінімальні:
  • ОС: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Процесор: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent, AMD Athlon X4 740 (2 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Оперативна пам’ять: 4 GB ОП
  • Відеокарта: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB), Intel Iris Pro 5200 (shared), Radeon HD 5850 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: версії 11
  • Мережа: Широкосмугове підключення до інтернету
  • Місце на диску: 16 GB доступного місця
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендовані:
  • ОС: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Процесор: Intel Core i5-4570T (2*2900) or equivalent, AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Оперативна пам’ять: 4 GB ОП
  • Відеокарта: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB), Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • DirectX: версії 11
  • Мережа: Широкосмугове підключення до інтернету
  • Місце на диску: 16 GB доступного місця

mac_requirements.minimum:
Мінімальні:
  • ОС: macOS 10.13.5
  • Процесор: 1.8GHz Intel Core i3 or better
  • Оперативна пам’ять: 8 GB ОП
  • Відеокарта: 1GB Nvidia 650M, 2GB AMD Radeon M290, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or better (see notes for more details)
  • Місце на диску: 25 GB доступного місця
  • Додаткові примітки: The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
    • * All 13" MacBook Pros released since 2016
    • * All 15” Retina MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 15" MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012 with a 1GB Graphics Card
    • * All 21.5” iMacs released since Late 2013 with a 1.8GHz i3 processor or better
    • * All 27” iMacs released since Late 2013 (1)
    • * All 27" iMac Pros
    • * All Mac Pros released since Late 2013
    • 1. Late 2012 models with a Nvidia 675MX or Nvidia 680MX graphics cards are also supported.
    Please note for your computer to meet the minimum requirements it must match or better all elements of the listed system requirements. For more detailed specifications check the Feral website. ———
      The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support.
    • * All Mac Mini's since Late 2012
    • * All 12" MacBooks released since Early 2016
    • * All 13" MacBook Airs released since Mid 2012
    • * All 13" MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 13” Retina MacBook Pros released since Mid 2012
    • * All 21’5” iMacs released since Early 2013
    ———
